SetConstant Properties

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from Constant. View the class hierarchy.

PropertyDescription
ElementReference to the set element. The properties of the set apply to all elements in the set. Details
Horizontal Scrollbar VisibleIf TRUE, displays the horizontal scroll bar. Details
Number of Visible ElementsNumber of visible elements in the set. Details
Top Visible ElementGet the first visible element of the set constant. Details
Vertical Scrollbar VisibleIf TRUE, displays the vertical scroll bar. Details
